import React, { useState } from 'react' import './AllScenarios.css' const AllScenarios = () => { const data1 = localStorage.getItem('data'); const data=JSON.parse(data1); console.log(data) const handledelete=(index)=> { data.splice(index,1) } return (

Scenario

Scenario Id Scenario Name Scenario Time Number of Vehicle Add Vehicle Edit Delete {data.map((data,i)=>( {data.name} {data.seconds} {data.seconds} {data.seconds} {data.seconds}
))}
) } export default AllScenarios
